title: Number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark 2008 to 2018
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of students, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2013 to 2008.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately positive which exists from 2017 to 2014.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2014 to 2013.
gold: The statistic shows the number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark from 2008 to 2018 . The number increased from about 118 thousand upper secondary education students in 2008 to about 149 thousand students in 2018 .
